title.text: Security Update for Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 Service Pack 1 Redistributable Package (KB2538243)

description.text: A security issue has been identified leading to MFC application vulnerability in DLL planting due to MFC not specifying the full path to system/localization DLLs.  You can protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft.  After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
